content.description: Start standing on rock under landing.   Match hands on good jug to start, pull on, throw a heel, bump left hand up up up and a big dynamic move to the top lip.  Haul yourself up and over the edge however you see fit.  short but fun dynamic problem.
content.protection: Make sure you pad that rock you stood on to start or your in for it if you fall.
content.location: The problem is on the teeter totter, a big boulder right along the trail leading through the back of beyond area from the powerlines to the quarry.   Start matched on good jug.

content.description: This area is near the big rock quarry, if you continue on the green trail past the homeless camp gully, past the selectmen stones, through the marsh, right at the road and left on the second trail across the powerlines.   Following this trail will take you through the whole gully and past the quarry and eventually on to the erratic plane area.   There are a few sick sick sick overhanging problems, a couple caves, and a big wet 60 foot wall with a classic offwidth in it.
